Posts.EditableText: I want to have a picture hanging on the wall of my lobby that the player can look at and then when finished can look away. I have managed to get a picture in and have the player look at it but I can not figure out how to get them to look away and have the picture close on the page. I know this is probably an easy thing to do but I am brand new to this. Thanks for any help! Also, I am using the Editor on the desktop platform, not coding directly.
